notes:
### Please read the link below before enable and play TagSoku mod
- [TagSoku setup and how to play - Google Doc](https://docs.google.com/document/d/17d7kw7Ciyr4dfJkpO4E9DFoDAODpB76sbHenLZH0RKU/edit?usp=sharing)
- When using Tag Burst or Border Break, prioritize the use the free bomb charges
- Tag Burst cost: 2 cards -> 3 cards
- Border Break cost: 2 cards -> 3 cards
- only compatible with Soku2 2.30g, no lower Soku2 version
